title: Martial Inverse - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Harem   Martial Arts   Xianxia
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Alchemy   Body Tempering   Cultivation   Herbalist   Male Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Unique Cultivation Technique
author: Merely a Small Fry   只是小虾米
description:
To sink into deep sleep, not knowing how much time has passed. A waste? No, a genius!

Emperor veins bestowed by the heavens. A crippled body? No, a godly body!

The world as the enemy, fighting alone in all directions. His dignity must be retrieved!

Martial inverse cultivating god, supreme above the world from past to present!

A journey to godhood, moving unhindered and matchless!

One day I’ll laugh, and I’ll laugh at the heavens! Godly body shall accomplish completion, to break the universe!>
